TopicTitle: First mun landing and rescue mission

Articles.Content:
Hey,

I started playing Kerbal a week or two ago and I am proud to finally have made it to the moon with my own rocket built from standard parts. Picture in the post.

Now that I've run out of fuel I need to get a rescue mission going to get him back! This is what is great about this game, there is always a reason why a plan doesn't work, and tweaking one thing leads to unexpected consequences somewhere else which requires more tweaking. Thanks to the community I can always get help and that keeps me going.

Tin Pot Koala

Edited June 14, 2015 by Vanamonde
Pic fix.

Welcome TinPotKoala.

The Imgur link you want to copy and use here is the BBCode one. I edited one into your post for you.

I love seeing players who are just discovering KSP! Welcome to the forums. You pinpointed exactly why I love this game. Something always goes wrong, but the most fun you can have in this game is flying by the seat of your pants trying to fix it.

Let us know how the rescue mission goes!
